articles.title: Novo Nordisk Jumps As FDA OKs Wegovy Pill As First-Ever Oral GLP-1 Weight Loss Drug
articles.mainIdea: Novo Nordisk Jumps As FDA OKs Wegovy Pill As First-Ever Oral GLP-1 Weight Loss Drug
articles.summary: Investor's Business Daily: Novo Nordisk Jumps As FDA OKs Wegovy Pill As First-Ever Oral GLP-1 Weight Loss Drug. The FDA approved Novo Nordisk's Wegovy pill as the first oral GLP-1 treatment for weight loss. The Danish drug giant jumped overnight. Related tickers mentioned: NONOF, NVO, VKTX.

articles.title: Pill Version of Wegovy Is Approved for Use in the U.S.
articles.mainIdea: Pill Version of Wegovy Is Approved for Use in the U.S.
articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: Pill Version of Wegovy Is Approved for Use in the U.S.. Novo Nordisk said it plans to start selling the new pill in the U.S. soon after the new year, with a cash price of $149 a month for the starting dose.
